author: greddin
msg: SHALE-227.  Added framework/ and sandbox/ directories.  Now to move stuff around.

author: bayard
msg: Switched the event and listener objects to extend the java.util.EventObject and EventListener classes as suggested by Niall in SANDBOX-157

author: cam
msg: 1. The 'animateColor' element is now supported, although not with non-sRGB
2. The 'keySplines' attribute is now supported for all animation elements.
3. Animations are in error now if they are used to animate an attribute
not appropriate for the animation element, e.g. trying to animate
